### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) 
-  Wooden chest (position 40.5, -83.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position 41.5, -83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -81.5)

### Coal Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in this execution step. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* Entities on the map: 
  + Chest (name='wooden-chest', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.5, y=-83.5))
  + BurnerMiningDrill (name='burner-mining-drill', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=41.0, y=-82.0))
  + Chest (name='wooden-chest', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=41.5, y=-83.5))
  + BurnerInserter (name='burner-inserter', direction=Direction.DOWN, position=Position(x=39.5, y=-81.5))
  + Furnace (name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=0.0, y=0.0))
